rounds.response:
With Q♥A♦ on a board of J♦-7♦-10♦-J♥:

Equity check:
- We have broadway straight draw (need a K, 9, Q or 8 of diamonds for nut flush-straight) – but the J♥ paired the board, reducing our outs and already making full-house possibilities for villain. 
- Our ace-high is worthless against any pair or made hand.  
- Pot (120) vs. stack (900) – too expensive to bluff into the paired board.

Best to cut our losses.

[Player 0] [Check]
